hero.title: Motion Core
hero.subtitle: Declarative React animation hooks
hero.description: Implement rich motion with a simple API. Provides various animation hooks like useFadeIn, useSlideUp, making it easy for developers to use.

hooks.title: Animation Hooks
hooks.description: Provides various animation hooks including useFadeIn, useSlideUp, useScrollReveal, and more.

scroll.title: Scroll-based Animations
scroll.description: Uses Intersection Observer to automatically animate elements on scroll.

presets.title: Preset System
presets.description: Quickly apply animation styles with various presets like dramatic, minimal.

performance.title: Performance Optimized
performance.description: Uses requestAnimationFrame to provide smooth and efficient animations.

typescript.title: TypeScript
typescript.description: Improve developer productivity with perfect type support.

lightweight.title: Lightweight
lightweight.description: Minimal dependencies to minimize bundle size.

cta.title: Get Started Now
cta.description: Install with npm or pnpm and start using immediately.
